price: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and a generous provision.
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
